- [ ] Copyright / IP
- [ ] Abuse / Misuse

- [ ] Other compliance concern

## Affected Target

- Repository path / file:
- Package / version:
- Link(s):

## Description

Describe the issue and why action is required.

## Evidence

Provide references and evidence links.

Do not post highly sensitive personal data in public.

## Requested Action

- [ ] Clarification
- [ ] Content change
- [ ] Stop distribution / takedown
- [ ] Other

## Contact

Provide a reachable contact method for follow-up.
